ghostPost.plaintext:
A Ghost(Pro) subscription can be upgraded or downgraded from the account 
billing
settings [https://my.ghost.org/billing].

To change plans, go to your account billing settings
[https://my.ghost.org/billing]  and click the "Adjust Subscription" button to
select a new plan and billing frequency. A partial credit will be given for
unused time on the old plan, and a partial charge will be made for the new plan.

For any billing questions related to a change of plan, feel free to reach out to
 support@ghost.org  for help.
ghostPost.html:
A Ghost(Pro) subscription can be upgraded or downgraded from the account billing settings.

To change plans, go to your account billing settings and click the "Adjust Subscription" button to select a new plan and billing frequency. A partial credit will be given for unused time on the old plan, and a partial charge will be made for the new plan.

For any billing questions related to a change of plan, feel free to reach out to support@ghost.org for help.
